name: CoreX Whey Protein
description: High-quality whey protein for muscle recovery.
shortDescription: High-quality whey protein for muscle recovery.
longDescription: CoreX Whey Protein delivers a premium blend of whey concentrate and isolate designed for lean muscle growth, faster recovery, and everyday nutrition. With delicious flavors and easy mixability, it’s the perfect addition to any athlete’s diet.

usageTips.when: Best used post-workout for muscle recovery or anytime during the day to support lean muscle growth.
usageTips.blend: Mix one scoop into 6–10oz of water, milk, or your favorite beverage. Blend with fruits or nut butters for added flavor and nutrition.
usageTips.pairWith: Pair with CoreX Creatine for enhanced endurance, strength, and recovery.

name: CoreX Creatine
description: Boost your performance with pure creatine monohydrate.
shortDescription: Boost your performance with pure creatine monohydrate.
longDescription: CoreX Creatine Monohydrate is a clinically proven supplement that helps increase muscle strength, power, and performance during high-intensity workouts.

usageTips.when: Take daily to support muscle strength and recovery. Best used post-workout or before intense training sessions.
usageTips.blend: Mix one scoop into water, juice, or add to your protein shake. Unflavored for easy stacking.
usageTips.pairWith: Pair with CoreX Whey Protein for a complete strength and recovery stack.

name: IGNITE
description: Explosive energy and sharp focus with no crash.
longDescription: IGNITE is a high-stimulant pre-workout engineered to deliver clean energy, intense focus, and sustained performance without the crash. Ideal for heavy sessions and high-intensity training.

name: CoreX BCAA
description: Branched-chain amino acids for muscle recovery.
shortDescription: Branched-chain amino acids for muscle recovery.
longDescription: CoreX BCAA provides a 2:1:1 ratio of leucine, isoleucine, and valine to support faster recovery, reduce muscle soreness, and fuel workouts.

usageTips.when: Consume during or after workouts to promote recovery and reduce fatigue.
usageTips.blend: Mix one scoop into 8–12oz of cold water and sip throughout training.
usageTips.pairWith: Pair with CoreX Pre-Game for ultimate workout performance.

name: CoreX Fat Burner
description: Thermogenic formula for accelerated fat loss.
shortDescription: Thermogenic formula for accelerated fat loss.
longDescription: CoreX Fat Burner combines thermogenic ingredients with energy boosters to help you burn calories, improve focus, and enhance workout intensity.

usageTips.when: Take 1–2 capsules in the morning or before workouts.
usageTips.blend: Consume with water. Avoid taking late in the evening to prevent sleep disruption.
usageTips.pairWith: Stack with CoreX Whey Protein to preserve muscle while cutting fat.

name: ZEN MODE
description: Night-time recovery with magnesium, ashwagandha, and adaptogens.
longDescription: ZEN MODE is formulated to promote restful sleep and overnight recovery using magnesium, adaptogens, and calming botanicals to support natural sleep cycles.

name: CoreX Multivitamin
description: Complete daily multivitamin for overall health.
shortDescription: Complete daily multivitamin for overall health.
longDescription: CoreX Multivitamin is a complete formula designed to support daily energy, immune health, and joint function with essential vitamins and minerals.

usageTips.when: Take daily in the morning with food.
usageTips.blend: Consume one tablet with a glass of water.
usageTips.pairWith: Use with CoreX Wellness Greens for full-spectrum health support.

name: CoreX Amino Surge
description: Advanced amino acid blend for intra-workout support.
shortDescription: Advanced amino acid blend for intra-workout support.
longDescription: CoreX Amino Surge delivers a precise blend of amino acids for hydration, muscle repair, and endurance during training sessions.

usageTips.when: Sip during workouts or immediately after for best recovery.
usageTips.blend: Mix one scoop into 12oz of cold water and consume throughout training.
usageTips.pairWith: Pair with CoreX Pre-Game for peak performance and recovery.

name: PULSE
description: Nitric oxide booster for maximum vascularity.
shortDescription: Feel the surge. Own the pump.
longDescription: PULSE enhances blood flow and muscle fullness using clinically dosed nitric oxide precursors and pump agents to maximize vascularity and nutrient delivery.

name: CoreX Garage Sale Protein
description: Discounted protein powder for budget muscle building.
shortDescription: Discounted protein powder for budget muscle building.
longDescription: CoreX Garage Sale Protein offers great value without compromising on quality. Ideal for budget-conscious athletes, it provides essential protein for muscle repair and growth, with the same trusted CoreX standard.

usageTips.when: Use post-workout or as a meal replacement for affordable nutrition.
usageTips.blend: Mix one scoop into water or milk. Shake well for best results.
usageTips.pairWith: Pair with CoreX BCAA for a complete recovery stack.

name: CoreX Wellness Greens
description: Superfood greens for daily health and joint support.
shortDescription: Superfood greens for daily health and joint support.
longDescription: CoreX Wellness Greens combines nutrient-dense superfoods, antioxidants, and probiotics to support digestion, immunity, and daily energy. A convenient way to add more greens into your routine, it helps balance nutrition and overall wellness.

usageTips.when: Take daily in the morning or afternoon for best results.
usageTips.blend: Mix one scoop into cold water or juice. Stir or shake well.
usageTips.pairWith: Pair with CoreX Multivitamin for full-spectrum health support.
